parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post refers to Diana Miclăuş, the mayor of Poduri, Bacău.  However, it does not refer to her as a candidate in any parliamentary election. The post is a message on the occasion of Romania's National Day.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a public Facebook post, paid for by Moldova Invest, and addresses a wide audience, not just a specific individual. The message is clearly intended for a broad public.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is to convey a message of national unity and pride on Romania's National Day. There is no explicit or implicit call to vote for or against any candidate. The content is celebratory and patriotic, not electoral.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>Potentially True. The post could be considered a form of citizen journalism, reporting on the mayor's message. However, it's not strictly journalistic in the traditional sense. It's more of a public announcement or statement.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. It's not a personal opinion; it's a formal message from the mayor on a national holiday.  While it expresses sentiments, it doesn't express a personal opinion unrelated to her official role.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>543774711900182</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post does not constitute electoral propaganda.  While it features a public figure, the content is entirely focused on Romania's National Day and does not promote any candidate or party participating in the parliamentary elections. The post's purpose is celebratory and patriotic, not electoral.  The fact that it's a paid advertisement does not automatically make it electoral propaganda; the content itself must be analyzed. In this case, the content is unrelated to the parliamentary elections.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Moldova Invest</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
